Kirkland.Maple Leaf, Seattle:
Maple Leaf is a mostly residential neighborhood located in northeast Seattle.


== History ==
The area that is now the Maple Leaf neighborhood appeared on maps in 1894 as a plat by real estate promoters and was called the Maple Leaf Addition to the Green Lake Tract. The name may have come from the Maple Saw Mill that operated to the east on Lake Washington or from some maple trees that once grew in the area.
